posts.post_title: WTB T207 Napoleon backs and Recruit Class Anonymous backs
posts.post_content:
I still need most of them.  Paying very strong prices for the ones I want most and strong prices on the ones that are a little bit down the list.

If you have any you might part with, send me scans at [url]lukealyon@gmail.com[/url]

Thanks!
